docs.snippet: Under Mr. Hudnut, Indianapolis went from a sleepy Midwestern town to a thriving city, a transformation driven largely by a focus on professional sports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Under Mr. Hudnut, Indianapolis went from a sleepy Midwestern town to a thriving city, a transformation driven largely by a focus on professional sports.
docs.abstract: William H Hudnut III, who rejuvenated downtown Indianapolis with emphasis on professional sporting events over his four terms as mayor, dies at age 84.

headline.main: William Hudnut, Mayor Who Transformed Indianapolis, Is Dead at 84
headline.print_headline: William Hudnut, 84, Mayor Who Built Up Indianapolis

docs.snippet: Liverpool had to combat "wild football" from Everton before a last-gasp winner from Sadio Mane earned the visitors a 1-0 derby win at Goodison Park on Monday, said manager Juergen Klopp....

docs.snippet: Los Angeles Clippers star forward Blake Griffin will undergo minor surgery on his right knee this week and is expected to be sidelined until at least January, the NBA club said on Monday....

headline.print_headline: Clippers' Griffin to Be Sidelined 3-6 Weeks

docs.snippet: Quarterback Tom Brady led four scoring drives -- two after turnovers -- and New England's defense kept the Denver Broncos out of the end zone Sunday in a 16-3 victory that clinched the Patriots' eighth straight AFC East title and the playoff berth...
docs.lead_paragraph: Quarterback Tom Brady led four scoring drives -- two after turnovers -- and New England's defense kept the Denver Broncos out of the end zone Sunday in a 16-3 victory that clinched the Patriots' eighth straight AFC East title and the playoff berth that goes with it.

headline.main: Patriots Beat Broncos, Clinch NFL-Record Eighth Division Title
headline.print_headline: Patriots Beat Broncos, Clinch NFL-Record Eighth Division Title
